attributes.description:
If space and comfort is what you are looking for in a family SUV, then this one is a must see. Very well looked after with Spare Keys and a Full Service history @ Hyundai. Fitted with Power steering, Air con, E/Windows, E/Mirrors, Multi function steering wheel, Blue tooth, Cruise control, 3 Different steering modes, On board computer, Full leather interior, CD front loader, Down hill assist, Center diff lock, Key less entry, Push button Stop/Start, Folding rear seats, Parcel tray, Roof rails and alloy mag wheels.

Finance can be arranged on site, contact me for application form or to view.

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade ins welcome.

Theos Bakkie Sales.
73 Van Riebeeck Rd (next to Nandos).
Kuilsriver.
Cape Town.

Gears - 6 / ALL.
Acceleration - 10 seconds.
Top Speed - 190 km/h.
Airbags (total) - 6.
Length - 4,690 mm.
Seats - 7.
Fuel Tank Capacity - 64 litres.
Boot Capacity - 277 litres.
Service Intervals - 15,000 km.

attributes.description:
Balance of  48months/61000km Premium Maintenance Plan!!! 

ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town. ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles
